nodes.text: The Yawari Cliffs were a region on the Forest Moon of Endor. The cliffs resembled a plateau, separating the lower more lush Jiberah Plains to the south, and the higher more barren Desert of Salma to the north.

In the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, the Yawari Cliffs were one of many designated planetary regions. The game, developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, was shut down on December 15, 2011.
